short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open 'Google Translate' page to look up selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open 'Google Translate' page to look up selected texts.

When Google Translate tab is closed, previous active tab will be active again.
This is very helpful if you are in middle of handful of tabs.
